nodes.text: Light amplification goggles, also known as infra-goggles, were a type of goggles similar to macrobinoculars. The difference is that these goggles could filter and balance levels of light, allowing the user to see in pitch black areas, though the vision was cast in a greenish hue. The infra-goggles required batteries to function, which drained at a rate comparative to Electrobinoculars. They could be worn during combat, which came to good use when Jedi Kyle Katarn used them in the dark mines of Artus Prime.
